name: Monster Hunter
description: When Cpt. Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom.

review.author: Gordon-11
review.heading: Good visual effects
review.reviewBody: The film has good visual effects, but that's about it. The story is non existent, and nothing is explained. It is a brainless monster film that may entertain, but it's ultimately forgettable.

keywords: parallel world,monster,based on video game,soldier,female soldier
